mapper.update: update room_config set room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_join_table = #{minScore4JoinTable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ante = #{ante,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_charge = #{serviceChargeRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rob_multiple = #{robMultiple,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, doubleRoles = #{doubleRoles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_off = #{onOff,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, room_id, min_join_table, ante, service_charge,rob_multiple,doubleRoles,on_off from room_config where on_off = 1 order by ante asc
